reviewText: My grandsons own many Veggie Tale movies.  I have never seen a bad one.  I have watched them over and over and over again and enjoy them each time.  Sometimes I just watch my grandsons faces and see how enthralled they are in the movie.  Lyle The Kindly Viking is wonderful.

Lyle the Viking is a timeless story that all 3 years olds and under need to hear. The vikings think that everything belongs to them. Sharing is a ridiculous notion that only fools follow. Lyle understands that in order to recieve a real gift, you have to give. And eventually you will get something back in return when you most need it.

The best thing of this video is that it teaches a timeless tale without getting overly religious. Some people are turned off when religion is brought into the equation but no one need fear this story. The message is a truth we all need to hear. Especially children in the "mine" stage. Plus it's filled with singing. My son loves singing (and so do I). Definitely a must own for any parent.
Veggietales are entertaining for the whole family. We own nearly every one of them. Highly recommended.
We love VeggieTales for teaching character in our children.  Old and young alike love these videos.

This is another wonderful VT video.  The moral of this show is sharing, and Archibald the Asparagus has taken over Veggie Tales for the episode.  With the help of the French Peas, he first stages the first all-veggie production of Shakespeare's "Omelet", involving a Prince Omelet of Denmark and a shortage of eggs.  The second story is the "Rogers and Hammerstein" musical called "Lyle the Kindly Viking", which tells the story of Lyle, who is the only Viking who does not go on raids with the others.  Instead, he shares his homemade potholders with neighbors.

This movie has some great musical moments and is an excellent way to help teach sharing to youngsters.  My kids love the songs and the stories, and I find myself singing along, too.

My grandchildren loved this episode of Veggie Tales!!  All the Veggie Tales episodes teach important life lessons and encourage kids to be kind, honest, thoughtful, forthright and true.  They are silly enough to make kids laugh, but also teach values.  :)
My kids love this one.  My 1 year old will actually watch it, my 2 year old asks to watch the "sharing veggie viking" . It's a really good one!
Anything Veggietales is great and uplifting!
Veggie tales are good clean family fun!
All of the Veggietale series are great for both kids and adults! Pretty funny! We wish there were more Christian based shows on Amazon!
Very good childrens video.

Veggie Tales is awesome.  What more do you really need to know?  The winning lottery numbers for tomorrow's drawing?  Ok, fine.  Here they are: 4, 8, 15, 16, 23, and 42.  So now that you're rich, be sure to buy this Veggie Tales movie.  It's awesome!
The Veggie Tales movies are all excellent.  The music is great, the stories have substance to them with a moral lesson.  You just can't go wrong with a Veggie Tale movie!

Maybe it was all those Rodgers and Hammerstein plays I was dragged to as a youngster.  Some of the dialogue is genius parody, and it is pretty clear in the object lesson, too.
We could use more children's programming that is full of stuff for the adults and laughs for the kids. Old looney tunes was pretty good with that, modern looney tunes - does it still air? - not so much. Even so, the adult content of that programming often had innuendo that was a little too "adult" to be wholesome.  Here the attraction lies in the fact that the comments aimed at me rely on my own cultural exposure to other art, rather than body function humor.
Another great family centered movie from the folks at Big Idea.  They do a great job of taking stories from the bible and making them relatable to children without watering down the message.
The lessons in Veggie Tales are invaluable for the kids! I have yet to be disappointed in any of the episodes.

My kid loves these guys, especially the squash for some reason! The stories, the positive messages they promote!
Good stuff!
My daughter loved this movie. Great inspirational movie. Neat how they showed how God sees his children and how we should too.
The story shows us how kind acts are rciprocated in our livs. The words in the songs make learning this fun.
Veggie Tales are great family movies that teach us what God's Word says. I recommend this and other Veggie Tales to anyone.
We love the how the VeggieTales movies deal with real life issues that kids face and show them the best way to handle it according to the Bible.
My 1 year old son loves Veggie Tales. He has been watching since he 3 months old. We LOVE Veggie Tales.
She adores VeggieTales, and now with amazon prime, we can watch it before going to bed in my tablet, is perfect.

These shows are just the best! I swear, when my kids watch these, instead of mickey mouse, they act better. They are nicer to each other, they listen better. It's amazing!
Teaches about kindness in a very cute way. My grandchild really enjoyed it and as always  keeps the emphasis on The Lord.
Kids really get the point of sharing and not taking from others. I always enjoy watching these with my kids. And they always seem to absorb the morals.
It is good for 24 months or older children, which is alright. The story line is excellent and has good movie quality.
What America needs more of best cartoon collection is my review ot hands down without a doubt  ..kids love it!!!

Classic Veggie Tales - Wonderful way of illustrating moral lessons for young children from a Christian perspective with vegetables (cucumbers, tomatoes, peas, etc.) in starring roles. The tales are spun to be entertaining to children and adults alike.
My almost 4 year old son loves this VeggieTales. Good message in the video, sweet story. I would highly recommend this movie.
A great fix to share with our children, it clearly communicates the general message in a way that the child viewer can absorb.
My son loves VegiTales, and Kyle the Kindly Viking has become one of his favorites.  It brings home a lesson that I just could' t get across to him.  Thanks VegiTales.

This is one of my favorite VeggieTales. Two great stories about sharing and one of the best silly songs ever. I have loved it ever since it first came out. My brother and I are both adults now but we still enjoyed watching it again and singing along to all the songs.
Another winning movie by this production company stressing values and morals to our youngsters. Children enjoy the characters and storyline
Family friendly story with a good message.  The predictabile formula is good for pre-schoolers, but elementary school kids still enjoy the details and characters.
To be honest, it is a really great dvd. It's one of the classics from veggie tales. I'm hoping to get some of the original and new veggie tales  dvd collection. I recommend this DVD to anybody! :)

I have been watching these movies ever since my children were born.  Needless to say I am hook3ed on them.  Their message is great, their humor is fun and the songs will ALWAYS GET STUCK IN YOUR HEAD.
Vegetales are always spot on with good stories for kids. Good quality viewing with no worries from me when they are watching!
Like all the veggie tale movies, this one has a great moral and fun music.  My little guy loved it!
VeggieTales are the very best cartoons out there! Unlike most "kid" cartoons made these days, VeggieTales are truly kid safe.

this classic veggie tales was done at the peak of big idea's time.  Lyle, the kindly viking is inherently a musical take off of Pirates of Penzance.  The first half of the film, Omelet, is a veggie adaptation of Hamlet. All in all one of our family favorite movies!
My husband and I love these stories. They hold the kids attention and always have a great moral and lesson!
Wonderful songs (I catch myself singing it too) and a great lesson.  We love VeggieTales and Lyle, The Kindly Viking doesn't disappoint.
My kids loved this video, so glad I added it to our collection.  Great lesson too, just what my 3 and 4 year old need, sharing!

Veggie tales is a christian as well as good moral show. I saw another review and they said it was propaganda. It is no more propaganda than anything else on TV. Coca Cola commercial or anything else. Veggie tales does have a message and it is heck of a lot better than any you would see on MTV of sex, drugs and violence. So if you don't want something christian don't buy it, it's still America where I live.

Warning: Veggietales is a Christian Fundamentalist franchise. If you do not want your child to be exposed to the God, Jesus, Hell, Armageddon & Damnation themes, you should stay clear of these videos. This franchise should be listed under Christian or God and Spirituality videos.
I am not an atheist - but if you actually see some of the stuff they come up with in some of the Veggietales - your jaw will drop open.
This is a very cute way to program an agenda into a small persons head - not the type of stuff many of us want to expose them to and it should be openly labeled as Christian Children's Movie.

Because of the musical nature of this show my son will watch the whole thing. Even for adults this is a funny and entertaining show.  Good Moral values expressed in this show as well. P.S. Please fix NR to NR Family to Allow Parental settings to work properly.
Love the veggie tales!!  Great movies with important lessons on life and our Faith in ways kids can understand.  Opens up dialogue in our house

My nephews love this DVD! Even the 3-yr-old goes around singing songs from this.... "when we share, we get our share of friends!" We have several of the Veggie Tales DVD's, and I think that Junior Asparagus as Lyle is one of the most appealing characters yet. The 7-yr-old loves the bonus features, which include lessons on how to draw various characters. It's fascinating to see the detail that goes into them!
We are a family of Gilbert & Sullivan fans, so the G&S references really hooked us in, including grandparents. This is truly entertaining for the whole family!

Had this video on VHS and it broke. My youngest daughter wanted to watch it but couldn't because the tape broke. Found this replacement on Amazon and ordered it. It showed up and Emma has been watching it nearly every day since it arrived. The Veggie Tales are very entertaining and small children can enjoy them because they are easy to understand. Veggie Tales teach life lessons by way of song and words. This story- Lyle the Kindly Viking- teaches about sharing. Great lessons for children.....and adults.

This came here in excellent condition and was here way sooner than i ever expected. Will definitaley order from this place again! Veggie tales is awesoem no matter how old you are. Good biblical principles and funny, great comedy and life application storys as well as who could refuse singing talking vegetables, they are wholesome in everyway!

This is my first review for VeggieTales. I never thought I do a review for a talking Vegetables show. But this is too cute and charming for me not too. Working with kids of all ages I always hear about the latest cartoons. I can say "VeggieTales" is probably one of the best things ever made for children. You don't have to be Religious to enjoy the show. Sometimes I find myself laughing harder than my kids. "Lyle the Kindly Viking" is one of my favorites. It's funny, bright, and a great movie to watch with kids. With all the things in the world children have to worry about it's great to know VeggieTales is around. =)
Great Story!
